Content.Text:
<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hey, thanks.
If you need anything else, come back.

<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
Are you kidding me?
Don't come unless you have business.

<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
Look, you don't have an animal that can
go there!

<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Fine, pick the animals to take with you.

<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Fine.
We'll go as soon as I get ready.

<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
This is <GREEN>Neil's Animals</GREEN>.
Oh, it's you, <MYNAME>.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOSS>It's such a pain, but I'll go ahead
and explain to you about the <RED>Animal
Sanctuary</RED>.
<PAGE>
It's a special place you can take any of
your farm animals... <RED>except chickens</RED>...
and graze them.
<PAGE>
When you graze them there, it takes away
their stress. And if you take them a few
times, they will give a <RED>special product</RED>.
<PAGE>
It costs money to go, but it's nice to
give your animals a change of scenery,
right?

<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
It doesn't look like you have an animal
to sell.

<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
Fine.
Pick the animal you want to sell.

<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Fine.
Which animal do you want to impregnate?

<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Huh? You don't seem to have an animal
that can get pregnant.
